name: Communist Clicker
description: Communist Clicker is more than just a clicker game! You can buy stonks from the stonks market which will go up and down over time in addition to the player also being able to affect it, you can even mine dogecoin and have miners try to crack the code so you can sell the coin for a trillion dollars, and you can even pay a visit the secret black mar... Never mind. You can also upgrade your clicks to gain more money for each click, and you can also buy and upgrade workers who will click so you don't have too!
